channel.title: Any way to write a custom font onto a image [PHP]?
channel.description:
Title.
Any way to write a custom font onto a image? I want to use a custom font, so is this possible?

item.title: Any way to write a custom font onto a image [PHP]?
item.dc:creator: @PeeHPee PeeHPee
item.description:
@PeeHPee wrote:

TabbyKiller:

Uhh use an original font, Arial or something and use various tools like smudge but change its settings around so it will not leave faded areas and download paint brush patterns and simply paint over the font. Just play around with shit until you come with what you like.

do you have down syndrome or do you just think programming and photoshop are the same thing?

Read full topic
item.source: Any way to write a custom font onto a image [PHP]?

item.title: Any way to write a custom font onto a image [PHP]?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“DAGSEE, post:2, topic:355970”]yo krackkidd done said hes done flamming so looks like your the one to apologize.[/quote]I just facepalmed so hard I gave myself a fivestar.

WE FUCKING KNOW. You don’t need to go around announcing every blatantly fucking obvious fact on these forums that there is. WE GET IT. So stop spamming and actually start being less of an annoyance to the community.

Oh, btw, krackkid did do some trolling/flaming towards Aaron, so shut up. Besides, Aaron only said something to krackkid because he has been a troll to the community for a long time, so its only natural Aaron had said something.

item.title: Any way to write a custom font onto a image [PHP]?
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:12, topic:355933”][quote author=Muroth link=topic=452474.msg3315910#msg3315910 date=1282315539]
http://rspsite.info/fonts/pr.php?text=muroth

thanks guys i got it to work

http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.imagettftext.php

That should do the trick…

Only real one who helped
[/quote]http://rspsite.info/fonts/pr.php?text=randomasstextherelolz

You need to add some conditionals so that they don’t add too many letters.[/quote]

Haha yeah, i’ll add a limit soon enough.

item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:5, topic:355933"][quote author=krackkid link=topic=452474.msg3315634#msg3315634 date=1282290319]
To bad I am friends with muroth…and you could of said it in pm, instead of spamming now couldn’t you smartass
[/quote]

I don’t give a shit if you are friends with him, That doesn’t give you the right to post a bullshit comment on a question about PHP, I’m sure the whole community is aware of your stupidity.[/quote]
I’m pretty sure Krackkid’s comment isn’t irrelevant as it’s 100% relevant. Instead of doing this in php, all the OP needs to do is open Photoshop, edit the photo with whatever font he wish’s, and put the photo on his website.
